name: Room Designer VR
description: Room Designer VR allows you to design a room while standing inside of it. Draw the floor plan directly on the ground. Place furniture objects, doors, windows and a lot of other fun stuff into your room. Apply textures for walls, floor and furniture objects.Feel your room in VR!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VR Ready graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Standard Soundcard Additional Notes: HTC Vive headset needed
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
